name: Dicey situation
description:
A game made for the GMTK jam 2022

Controls

Move by using the arrow keys or WASD

Hover over enemies to see their attack pattern
Disclaimer: The third level is bugged, it shows you the victory UI from the start. Feel free to play or skip the level, the other levels are working fine

Programming: Gemaco1397
Art: R3inis
Programming and game-design: GentleRedemptor
Music: Yokatz
